ISSUE.TITLE: Non String Data Objects Cause Empty Diagrams in Task App
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** If there are non-string Data Objects on a BPMN model, the Task application throws an error like: ``` VM7110:1 Uncaught ReferenceError: _drawDateDataObject is not defined at eval (eval at <anonymous> (VM7077 displaymodel.js:582), <anonymous>:1:1) at Object.<anonymous> (VM7077 displaymodel.js:582) at j (jquery.min.js:2) at Object.fireWith [as resolveWith] (jquery.min.js:2) at x (jquery.min.js:4) at XMLHttpRequest.b (jquery.min.js:4) ``` **Expected behavior** Diagrams should display regardless of the presence of Data Objects. **Code** The following BPMN fails to render a diagram in the Task app: ```xml <process id="dataObjectProcess" name="Data Object Process" isExecutable="true"> <dataObject id="testDataObject" name="Test Data Object" itemSubjectRef="xsd:int"> <extensionElements> <flowable:value>123</flowable:value> </extensionElements> </dataObject> <startEvent id="startEvent1" flowable:formFieldValidation="true"></startEvent> <sequenceFlow id="sid-854F6EF0-C522-4B51-880C-2E6B82DAE6D9" sourceRef="startEvent1" targetRef="sid-71B12BD3-BCE5-4EA7-971A-B104C0F0DD2E"></sequenceFlow> <intermediateCatchEvent id="sid-71B12BD3-BCE5-4EA7-971A-B104C0F0DD2E"> <timerEventDefinition> <timeDuration>PT1M</timeDuration> </timerEventDefinition> </intermediateCatchEvent> <sequenceFlow id="sid-3C25DB24-D99B-45B5-BF20-CDBC3AE1FBA4" sourceRef="sid-71B12BD3-BCE5-4EA7-971A-B104C0F0DD2E" targetRef="sid-CDD0CB7F-63E5-432D-9829-99BAACC36FD5"></sequenceFlow> <endEvent id="sid-CDD0CB7F-63E5-432D-9829-99BAACC36FD5"></endEvent> </process> ``` **Additional context** Flowable-Task app 6.4.2

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix issue with plan item identity links for async history

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Create stub methods for other Data Objects similar to _drawStringDataObject Resolves #1997
Create stub methods for other Data Objects similar to _drawStringDataObject (#1998) Resolves #1997
